mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( first_name, last_name, email, date_of_birth, gender, address, phone, role_id, password, user_name, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{roleId}, #{password}, #{userName}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, email, date_of_birth AS dateOfBirth, gender, address, phone, role_id AS roleId, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, password, user_name AS userName FROM users WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, email, date_of_birth AS dateOfBirth, gender, address, phone, role_id AS roleId, password AS password, user_name AS userName FROM users WHERE user_name = #{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, role_id = #{roleId}, password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
